tgt_original: pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntavacanairhi prāśnikānāmapratīto'rthaḥ pratipādyata iti ||  tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭatayā svayaṃ sādhyatvenepsitaḥ |  pratyakṣadyaviruddha iti vākyaśeṣaḥ |
sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ caiva sābhāsaṃ parasaṃvide |  pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tvātmasaṃvide ||-
tatra kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vā sapakṣa evāsti vipakṣe nāstyeva |
tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvat |  yatra hetoḥ sapakṣa evāstitvaṃ khyāpyate |
tadyathā |  yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti ||
uktāḥ pakṣādayaḥ ||  eṣāṃ vacanāni parapratyāyanakāle sādhanam |
kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ |  ko vā vipakṣa iti ||
tadyathā |  anitye śabde sādhye ghaṭādiranityaḥ sapakṣaḥ ||
yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti sapakṣānugamavacanam |  yannityaṃ tadakṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśamiti vyatirekavacanam |
nityaḥ pakṣaḥ |  asya ghaṭasukhādirvipakṣaḥ |  tratraikadeśe sukhādau vidyate'mūrtatvaṃ na ghaṭādau |
viruddhāvyabhicārī yathā |  anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavat |
nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavaditi |  ubhayoḥ saṃśayahetutvād dvāvapyetāveko'naikāntikaḥ samuditāveva ||
ayaṃ hi heturyathā dravyādipratiṣedhaṃ bhāvasya sādhayati tathā bhāvasyābhāvatvamapi sādhayati |  ubhayatrāvyabhicārāt ||
dharmiviśeṣaviparītasādhano yathā |  ayameva heturasminneva pūrvapakṣe'syaiva dharmiṇo yo viśeṣaḥ satpratyakartṛtvaṃ nāma tadviparītamasatpratyayakartṛtvamapi sādhayati |

src_original: སྒྲུབ་བྱེད་ཆོས་མ་གྲུབ་པ་དང་། བསྒྲུབ་བྱ་ཆོས་མ་གྲུབ་པ་དང་། གཉིས་ཀ་མ་གྲུབ་པ་དང་། མ་སྦྱར་བ་དང་། ཕྱིན་ཅི་ལོག་ཏུ་སྦྱོར་བའོ་༎ ཆོས་མི་༄༩༡བ་མཐུན་པའི་དཔེ་ལྟར་སྣང་ལ་ཡང་ལྔ་ཡོད་དེ་། བསྒྲུབ་པར་བྱ་བ་ལྡོག་པ་མེད་པ་དང་། སྒྲུབ་པར་བྱེད་པ་ལྡོག་པ་མེད་པ་དང་། གཉིས་ཀ་ལྡོག་པ་མེད་པ་དང་། ལྡོག་པ་མ་བསྟན་པ་དང་། ལྡོག་པ་ཕྱིན་ཅི་ལོག་ཏུ་སྦྱར་བའོ་༎
tgt_original: tadyathā |  sādhanadharmāsiddhaḥ 1,  sādhyadharmāsiddhaḥ 2,  ubhayadharmāsiddhaḥ 3,  ananvayaḥ 4,  viparītānvayaśceti 5 ||
ayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva bhāvādviruddhaḥ ||  dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhano yathā |
dharmisvarūpaviparītasādhano yathā |  na dravyaṃ na karma na guṇo bhāvaḥ ekadravyavattvāt guṇakarmasu ca bhāvāt sāmanyaviśeṣavaditi |
ananvayo yatra vinānvayena sādhyasādhanayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ pradarśyate |  yathā ghaṭe kṛtakatvamanityatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti ||
yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vravīti ||
tatra sādhanadharmāsiddho yathā |  nityaḥ śabdo'mūrtatvāt paramāṇuvat |
viparītavyatirekaśceti 5 ||  tatra sādhyāvyāvṛtto yathā |  nityaḥ śabdo'mūrtatvāt paramāṇuvat |  yadanityaṃ tanmurtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā paramāṇuḥ |
paramāṇorhi sādhānadharmo'mūrtatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ mūrtatvātparamāṇunāmiti |  sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ na vyāvṛttaṃ nityatvātparamāṇūnāmiti ||
paramāṇu hi sādhyaṃ nityatvamasti sādhanadharmo'mūrtatvaṃ nāsti mūrtatvātparamāṇūnāmiti ||
sādhyadharmāsiddho yathā |  nityaḥ śabdo'mūrtatvād buddhivat |  yadamurtaṃ tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ ||
buddhau hi sādhanadharmo'mūrtatvamasti sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ nāsti |
sādhānāvyāvṛtto yathā |  karmavaditi |  karmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvaṃ vyāvṛttam |  anityatvātkarmaṇāḥ |  sādhanadharmo'mūrtatvaṃ na vyāvṛttam |
ātmapratyāyanārthaṃ tu pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe ||
tatra pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yajjñānamarthe rūpādau nāmajātyādikalpanārahitam |  tadakṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣam ||
tasmādyadanumeye'rthe jñānamutpadyate'gniratra anityaḥ śabda iti vā tadanumānam ||
tato nityatvamamūrtatvaṃ ca na vyāvṛttam |  nityatvādamūrtatvāccākāśasyeti ||
yathā ghaṭe mūrtatvamanityatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti ||  viparītavyatireko yathā |
yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yanmūrtaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti ||
